QApplicationManager¶

Module QApplicationManager

Module for the main Graphical User Interface of RepTate. It is the GUI counterpart of ApplicationManager.

Module QApplicationWindow

Module that defines the basic GUI class from which all GUI applications are derived. It is the GUI counterpart of Application.
